title: Chambers of Xeric

properties.name: description
properties.value: This profit rate assumes 2 raids completed per hour, with the player earning 20,000 points in each. Your actual profit rate will vary greatly depending on speed, luck, and how many points you actually obtain.

content:
This article or section is incomplete and could do with improvement.
Reason: Needs quantity of Dragon darts, diamond bolts (e), Death, Chaos, and Fire runes, Zulrah's scales used in input, instead of a 100k figure
You can discuss this issue on the talk page or edit this article to improve it.
Chambers of Xeric
Requirements
Skills
  • 90+ , , , , recommended
  • 70+ recommended
  • A party member with 55+ , 78+ , 30+ (strongly recommended)
  • 70+ and 70+ recommended
Items
  • Shared: Neitiznot faceguard, Brimstone Ring
  • Melee: Bandos chestplate, Bandos tassets, Amulet of torture, Berserker ring (i), Dragon hunter lance, Avernic defender, Dragon warhammer, Primordial boots, Infernal cape
  • Ranged: Armadyl helmet, Armadyl chestplate, Armadyl chainskirt Necklace of anguish, Toxic blowpipe with Dragon darts, Twisted bow with Dragon arrows, Pegasian boots, Ava's assembler
  • Magic: Ancestral robe top, Ancestral robe bottom, Occult necklace, Tormented bracelet, Sanguinesti staff, Arcane spirit shield, Imbued god cape, Rune pouch (with runes for waters or freezes)
  • Items: Dragon pickaxe, 1 Stamina potion, Divine super combat potion, Divine ranging potion, Sanfew serum, 1-3 Super restore, High-levelled food for remaining inventory spaces, preferably Saradomin brews.
    • Quest
    Animal Magnetism for Ava's accumulator
    King's Ransom for Piety
    Other
    • 77 for Rigour and Augury
    • 85+ for higher yield from farming patches
    • 90 to make the strongest overloads Overload (+)
    • 90 to build the large raids storage unit
    Results
    ProfitExperience gained
    2,132,370 Varied
    Inputs (497,130)Outputs (2,629,500)
    2 × Super combat potion(4) (23,062)2 × Ranging potion(4) (846)4 × Stamina potion(4) (23,488)2 × Sanfew serum(4) (76,722)6 × Super restore(4) (91,092)10 × Saradomin brew(4) (77,970)2 × Anglerfish (3,950)200,000 × Coins (200,000) Dragon darts, diamond bolts (e), Death, Chaos, and Fire runes, Zulrah's scales0.013 × Dexterous prayer scroll (214,907)0.013 × Arcane prayer scroll (12,457)0.0027 × Twisted buckler (43,947)0.0027 × Dragon hunter crossbow (222,672)0.002 × Dinh's bulwark (18,098)0.002 × Ancestral hat (21,675)0.002 × Ancestral robe top (160,325)0.002 × Ancestral robe bottom (155,705)0.002 × Dragon claws (159,611)0.0013 × Elder maul (15,659)0.0013 × Kodai insignia (142,475)0.0013 × Twisted bow (1,461,970)

    This profit rate assumes 2 raids completed per hour, with the player earning 20,000 points in each. Your actual profit rate will vary greatly depending on speed, luck, and how many points you actually obtain.



    Nearly all of the profit (85.1%) comes from the raid's unique drops. Profit will vary wildly depending on how many and what type unique drops are received. It is not uncommon for players to experience long dry streaks. Raids rewards are based off how many points the team receives.

    For every 1000 raids points earned, expect:

    • 65,851 from unique drops.
    • 13,227 from common drops
    • Totalling 79,076 per 1,000 raids points.

    Each raid consumes roughly 259,271 in supplies.

    Strategies

    See the Chambers of Xeric article and the Chambers of Xeric Strategy Guide for a full description on how to complete raids.


    Raid points Expected loot
    10,000 775,990
    15,000 1,162,008
    20,000 1,547,201
    25,000 1,931,567
    30,000 2,315,108
    Due to constantly changing prices on the Grand Exchange, some information in this article may or may not be current.
    It is strongly recommended to check the live prices on the Grand Exchange before making large investments in any method.
    All prices on this page are cached, meaning it is possible that they appear out of date.
    To force a new cache of this page, click this link.
    If a money making method is out of date, you can edit it or leave a message on the talk page.
